articles.author: Bobby Vincent
articles.title: Every word Mauricio Pochettino said on Mudryk goal, Chelsea win, Boehly message, Palmer bargain - Football.London
articles.description: The full transcript from Mauricio Pochettino after the Argentine spoke in his post-match press conference following Chelsea's important victory over Newcastle United
articles.content:
Mauricio Pochettino was in a very pleasant mood after Chelsea picked up a much-needed win over Newcastle United.
Coming into the game, all the talk was once again about the head coach's future at th… [+5365 chars]
